mainResource.title: Structural Semantics: The Importance Of HTML5 Sectioning Elements

extraResources.title: The practical value of semantic HTML

sections.subHeading: Can you layout a page using the HTML5 structural elements
sections.intro: Given an image are you able to create markup to create a page that could match the image?
tasks: View the slides about the structural elements of HTML 5.

Next read about the structural elements from the W3C:  [W3C: HTML5 Structural Elements](https://www.w3.org/wiki/HTML_structural_elements?utm_source=twitterfeed&utm_medium=twitter#Enter_HTML5_structural_elements)
Markup the "Importance of Sections" content in the text file using semantic markup

sections.title: Chrome and Lighthouse

extraResources.title: Chrome Web Store: Web Server for Chrome

sections.intro: Your browser is an important part of your development environment. Learn to use some powerful tools for Google Chrome.
tasks: Use lighthouse to test your website
Install the web server for chrome to setup a local webserver

sections.title: Are your pages accessible?
sections.subHeading: Web Accessibility: what does it mean for your code?
sections.intro: Accessibility is important to ensure everyone can access our content.  This is both a moral and legal obligation for many content producers.
tasks: Read how to make tables accessible
Forms are important components of webpages. Learn how to make accessible forms
The code in the form activity has a number of problems. Fix the HTML to make it accessible
Learn about colour contrast and why it is important
Complete the colour activity to fix the colour contrast on a webpage
Use the colour contrast tools to test the colour contrast on your page
Check your website against the accessibility checklist and checker
